name: Super Dungeon Master Ace: The Classic Fantasy Adventure RPG
description: Play the top-down RPG-Maker version of Dungeon Master and battle your way through all 14 levels of this classic dungeon crawler.
minimum_requirements: OS: OS:Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 (32-bit/64-bit) Processor: Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution Storage: 290 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Processor: Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor Memory: 512 MB RAM Storage: 300 MB available space
